original_text: When he mustered them at Bezek, the people of Israel were three hundred thousand, and the men of Judah thirty thousand.
korean_text: 사울이 베섹에서 그들의 수를 세어 보니 이스라엘 자손이 삼십만 명이요 유다 사람이 삼만 명이더라

sentences.original_text: When he mustered them at Bezek,
the people of Israel were three hundred thousand,
and the men of Judah thirty thousand.
